name: Ballzer
description:
Have you ever played #Pong or any #remake of it? Have you ever played a good, much more complete, #retro take on its idea? Well, look no further!

Play Ping-Pong with a really quick ball versus yourself, a friend in local #multiplayer, or even an AI, unlock very difficult achievements, find secrets, and even destroy the screen while playing! All in this #arcade alike game!

It's available for #Windows, #Mac, and #Linux, and the #soundtrack will also be available for purchase in the future, with a few extra tracks included.

If you need to report any bugs or want to send suggestions, feel free to e-mail me at contact.igorvasiak@gmail.com or, preferably, contact me through my Discord server: https://discord.gg/CvG3p7Q
